name: designsetgo/fifty-fifty
title: Fifty Fifty
description: Full-width 50/50 split layout with edge-to-edge media on one side and constrained content on the other. Perfect for hero sections, feature highlights, and about sections.

attributeDescriptions.mediaPosition: Which side the media appears on (left or right)
attributeDescriptions.mediaId: WordPress media library attachment ID for the image
attributeDescriptions.mediaAlt: Alt text for the media image
attributeDescriptions.focalPoint: Focal point for the media image (x, y coordinates from 0 to 1)
attributeDescriptions.minHeight: Minimum height of the block (CSS value)
attributeDescriptions.verticalAlignment: Vertical alignment of content within the content side (top, center, bottom)
attributeDescriptions.contentPadding: Internal padding for the content side

attributes.content: Pair striking imagery with compelling content in a balanced 50/50 layout that commands attention.
